(Simplified: 铷)
Chinese Definition:
①一種金屬元素，化學性質活潑，與水作用能發生爆炸。具有敏銳的光電性能，是製造光電管的材料。銣的碘化物可供藥用。

銣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rú］
“铷1”的繁体字。
金属元素。符号Rb。银白色，化学性质活泼，与水作用能发生爆炸。具有敏锐的光电性能，是制造光电管的材料。

rubidium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rú]
Traditional characters for "铷1".
metal element. Symbol Rb. Silvery white, with lively chemical properties, it can explode when interacting with water. It has sharp photoelectric properties and is a material for manufacturing photoelectric tubes.
